_: This file was generated from the games necrodancer.xml & localization.xml files and should usually not be edited manually.

ability_burrow.inventory: [c:s]Burrow[/c] [i:yves][n]Press [i:button_r] to burrow underground, becoming immune to all damage.
ability_burrow.get: You got the [c:s]Burrow[/c] ability![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_r], and only [i:yves] can use this.[p]Yves can now use stamina to burrow underground, becoming immune to most enemy attacks!

ability_deku_spit.inventory: [c:s]Deku Spit[/c] [i:yves][n]Press [i:button_l] to shoot a deku seed projectile straight ahead.
ability_deku_spit.get: You got the [c:s]Deku Spit[/c] ability![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:yves] can use this.[p]Yves can now use stamina to shoot a deku seed projectile straight ahead!

ability_dins_fire.inventory: [c:s]Din's Fire[/c] [i:zelda][n]Press [i:button_l] to create a fireball. Use it again to detonate the fireball, dealing damage to adjacent squares, at the cost of stamina.
ability_dins_fire.get: You got [c:s]Din's Fire[/c]![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:zelda] can use this.[p]Press [i:button_l] to create an explosive ball of fire. It will explode if it collides with anything. You can also detonate it by pressing [i:button_l].

ability_downstab.inventory: [c:s]Down Thrust[/c][n]Allows you to drop on enemies from ledges and jump to adjacent spaces.
ability_downstab.get: You got the [c:s]Down Thrust[/c] ability![n]You don't need to assign it to a button.[p]If you drop down onto an enemy, you can hop to another space or on top of another enemy!

ability_fireball.inventory: [c:s]Fireball[/c] [n]Launches three magic fireballs in the direction you are facing.
ability_fireball.get: You got the [c:s]fireball[/c] spell![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:octavo] can use it.[p]Press [i:button_l] to launch three magic fireballs in the direction you are facing.

ability_haste.inventory: [c:s]Haste[/c] [n]Allows [c:b]Octavo[/c] to move without following the beat for a short time.
ability_haste.get: You got the [c:s]haste[/c] spell![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_r], and only [i:octavo] can use it.[p]Press [i:button_r] to give [c:b]Octavo[/c] the ability to move and act without being restricted by the beat. It will wear off after a few beats.

ability_mask_swap.inventory: [c:s]Mask Swap[/c] [i:skullkid][n]Press [i:button_r] to cycle through [c:b]Skull Kid[/c]'s masks, changing his weapon and abilities.

ability_naginata_charge.inventory: [c:s]Naginata Charge[/c] [i:impa][n]Press [i:button_l] to lunge forward one space, hitting enemies in a straight line up to 3 spaces ahead. Consumes stamina.
ability_naginata_charge.get: You got the [c:s]Naginata Charge[/c] ability![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:impa] can use it.[p][c:b]Impa[/c] lunges forward one space, hitting enemies in a straight line up to 3 spaces ahead of her. Consumes stamina.

ability_nayrus_love.inventory: [c:s]Nayru's Love[/c] [i:zelda][n]Use with [i:button_r] to reflect or block projectiles and damage depending on your timing, at the cost of stamina.
ability_nayrus_love.get: You got [c:s]Nayru's Love[/c]![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_r], and only [i:zelda] can use this.[p]Use it at the right time to reflect projectiles or melee damage from all directions. If your timing is one beat early, you can still block the damage!

ability_rupee_toss.inventory: [c:s]Rupee Toss[/c] [i:frederick][n]Press [i:button_l] to toss a blue rupee in a straight line, dealing damage and piercing through enemies. Costs [c:s]5 rupees[/c] to use.
ability_rupee_toss.get: You got the [c:s]Rupee Toss[/c] ability![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:frederick] can use it.[p][c:b]Frederick[/c] can toss a blue rupee in a straight line ahead of him, dealing damage and piercing through enemies. Costs [c:s]5 rupees[/c] to use.

ability_shadow_dins_fire.inventory: [c:s]Shadow Din's Fire[/c] [i:shadowzelda][n]Press [i:button_l] to create a fireball. Use it again to detonate the fireball, dealing damage to adjacent squares, at the cost of stamina.
ability_shadow_dins_fire.get: You got [c:s]Shadow Din's Fire[/c]![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:shadowzelda] can use this.[p]Press [i:button_l] to create an explosive ball of fire. It will explode if it collides with anything. You can also detonate it by pressing [i:button_l].

ability_shadow_nayrus_love.inventory: [c:s]Shadow Nayru's Love[/c] [i:shadowzelda] [n]Use with [i:button_r] to reflect projectiles and damage depending on your timing, at the cost of stamina.
ability_shadow_nayrus_love.get: You got [c:s]Shadow Nayru's Love[/c]![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_r], and only [i:shadowzelda] can use this.[p]Use it at the right time to reflect projectiles or melee damage from all directions. It will reflect damage for two beats!

ability_shadow_spin_attack.inventory: [c:s]Shadow Spin Attack[/c] [i:shadowlink] [n] Hold [i:button_l] to draw enemies closer and then release to deal damage to enemies adjacent to [c:b]Shadow Link[/c], at the cost of stamina.
ability_shadow_spin_attack.get: You got the [c:s]Shadow Spin Attack[/c] ability![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:shadowlink] can use it.[p][c:b]Shadow Link[/c] can now use stamina to charge a spin attack and unleash it to hit all surrounding enemies![p]While you are holding [i:button_l] to charge a spin attack, some enemies will be drawn toward you on each beat!

ability_shield_tech.inventory: [c:s]Shield Technique[/c][n]Allows [c:b]Link[/c] or [c:b]Cadence[/c] to attack while holding shield. Allows [c:b]Zelda[/c] to hold [c:s]Nayru's Love[/c] over multiple beats.
ability_shield_tech.get: You got the [c:s]Shield Technique[/c]![n]You don't need to assign it to a button.[p][c:b]Link[/c] and [c:b]Cadence[/c] can now attack while holding out the [c:s]shield[/c], but watch your [c:b]stamina[/c]![p][c:b]Zelda[/c] can now hold [c:s]Nayru's Love[/c] over multiple beats!

ability_shovel_strike.inventory: [c:s]Shovel Strike[/c] [i:cadence][n]Press [i:button_l] to unleash a shovel attack, stunning enemies for [c:r]1 damage[/c] and digging walls in a 3x2 area in front of you, at the cost of stamina.
ability_shovel_strike.get: You got the [c:s]Shovel Strike[/c] ability![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:cadence] can use this.[p][c:b]Cadence[/c] can now use stamina to unleash a shovel attack, hitting and stunning enemies and digging walls in a 3x2 area in front of her!

ability_skull_kid_special.get: You got the [c:s]Mask Magic[/c] ability![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:skullkid] can use it.[p][c:b]Skull Kid[/c] can now unlock the special power contained in his masks![p]Use [i:button_l] to use a magic attack. The attack changes depending on the currently equipped mask.

ability_spin_attack.inventory: [c:s]Spin Attack[/c] [i:link][n]Hold [i:button_l] and then release to deal damage to enemies adjacent to [c:b]Link[/c], at the cost of stamina.
ability_spin_attack.get: You got the [c:s]Spin Attack[/c] ability![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_l], and only [i:link] can use it.[p][c:b]Link[/c] can now use stamina to charge a spin attack and unleash it to hit all surrounding enemies![p]It will even fire a beam projectile when [c:b]Link[/c] is at full health.

ability_vocal_blast.inventory: [c:s]Vocal Blast[/c] [i:frederick][n]Press [i:button_r] to emit a burst of song, knocking back and confusing all adjacent enemies. Consumes stamina.
ability_vocal_blast.get: You got the [c:s]Vocal Blast[/c] ability![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_r], and only [i:frederick] can use it.[p][c:b]Frederick[/c] emits a quick burst of sound, knocking back and confusing all adjacent enemies. Consumes stamina.

antifairy.inventory: [c:s]Bomb Fairy[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]It will travel in a straight line when released and explode on contact!
antifairy.get: You caught a [c:s]bomb fairy[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]It will travel in a straight line when released and explode on contact!

arrow_fire.inventory: [c:s]Fire Arrows[/c][n]Imbues your arrows with a fire effect, at the cost of stamina.
arrow_fire.get: You got some [c:s]fire arrows[/c]![n]These can be equipped along with your [c:s]bow[/c] on the inventory screen.[p]They imbue your arrows with a fire effect!

arrow_ice.inventory: [c:s]Ice Arrows[/c][n]Imbues your arrows with an ice effect, at the cost of stamina.
arrow_ice.get: You got some [c:s]ice arrows[/c]![n]These can be equipped along with your [c:s]bow[/c] on the inventory screen.[p]They imbue your arrows with an ice effect!

arrow_lightning.inventory: [c:s]Lightning Arrows[/c][n]Imbues your arrows with a lightning effect, at the cost of stamina.
arrow_lightning.get: You got some [c:s]lightning arrows[/c]![n]These can be equipped along with your [c:s]bow[/c] on the inventory screen.[p]They imbue your arrows with a lightning effect!

arrow_poison.inventory: [c:s]Poison Arrows[/c][n]Imbues your arrows with a poison effect, at the cost of stamina.
arrow_poison.get: You got some [c:s]poison arrows[/c]![n]These can be equipped along with your [c:s]bow[/c] on the inventory screen.[p]They imbue your arrows with a poison effect!

bass_guitar.inventory: [c:b]Bass Guitar[/c] [n]You got this after defeating the Guitarmos Knights, deep in the Gerudo Ruins. It resonates with power...
bass_guitar.get: You got the [c:b]bass guitar[/c]![n]You can feel a magical aura when you hold it...[p]This may help you stop [c:b]Octavo[/c]!

bee.inventory: [c:s]Bee[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use this to release a bee to attack your enemies!

bomb.inventory: [c:s]Bomb[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Place a bomb in front of you. Deals damage to adjacent spaces. Can be kicked or thrown.

bomb_bag.get: You got the [c:s]big bomb bag[/c]![n]This lets you carry up to 10 bombs and 10 bombchus!

bombchu.inventory: [c:s]Bombchu[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]It moves in a straight line and explodes after seven beats or if it makes contact with something.

bongo.inventory: [c:b]Bongos[/c] [n]You got these after defeating the King Dobongo in the [c:b]Gerudo Arena[/c]. They resonate with power...
bongo.get: You got the [c:b]bongos[/c]![n]You can feel a magical aura when you hold them...[p]This may help you stop [c:b]Ganon[/c]!

boomerang.inventory: [c:s]Boomerang[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Throw this at enemies to stun them. It always finds its way back to you.
boomerang.get: You got the [c:s]boomerang[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Throw this at enemies to stun them. It always finds its way back to you.

bottle1.inventory: [c:s]Bottle[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Store things in this for later use.
bottle1.get: You got an empty [c:s]bottle[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Can be used to store potions, fish, bees, and fairies that you find.

bottle2.inventory: [c:s]Bottle[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Store things in this for later use.
bottle2.get: You got an empty [c:s]bottle[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Can be used to store potions, fish, bees, and fairies that you find.

bottle3.inventory: [c:s]Bottle[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Store things in this for later use.
bottle3.get: You got an empty [c:s]bottle[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Can be used to store potions, fish, bees, and fairies that you find.

bottle4.inventory: [c:s]Bottle[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Store things in this for later use.
bottle4.get: You got an empty [c:s]bottle[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Can be used to store potions, fish, bees, and fairies that you find.

bow.inventory: [c:s]Bow[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Hold the button down and release on the following beat to fire an arrow that can hit enemies from a distance.
bow.get: You got the [c:s]bow[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Hold the button down on one beat and release on the following beat to fire an arrow that can hit enemies from a distance!

cane.inventory: [c:s]Cane of Somaria[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use this to magically create a block in front of you, at the cost of stamina.
cane.get: You got the [c:s]Cane of Somaria[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Using this will magically create a block in front of you.

charm_boss.inventory: [c:s]Skull Charm[/c] [n]Reveals which areas in the world contain minibosses you have yet to defeat.
charm_boss.get: You got the [c:s]skull charm[/c]![n]Minibosses you haven't beaten yet will now be revealed on the map screen.[p]Open the map screen by     pressing [i:button_plus]. (You may then have to press [i:button_l] to see it!)

charm_chest.inventory: [c:s]Treasure Charm[/c] [n]Reveals which areas in the world contain chests and Pieces of Heart you haven't found yet.
charm_chest.get: You got the [c:s]treasure charm[/c]![n]Chests and Pieces of Heart yet to be found will now be revealed on the map screen.[p]Open the map screen by pressing [i:button_plus], then press [i:button_l] to see them!

charm_stairs.inventory: [c:s]Cave Charm[/c] [n]Reveals which areas in the world contain caves you have yet to explore.
charm_stairs.get: You got the [c:s]cave charm[/c]![n]All caves and shops will now be revealed on the map screen.[p]Open the map screen by pressing [i:button_plus]. (You may then have to press [i:button_l] to see it!)

charm_warp.inventory: [c:s]Warp Charm[/c] [n]Reveals which areas in the world contain Sheikah Stones you haven't activated.
charm_warp.get: You got the [c:s]warp charm[/c]![n][c:s]Sheikah Stones[/c] you haven't activated will now be revealed on the map screen.[p]Open the map screen by pressing [i:button_plus]. (You may then have to press [i:button_l] to see it!)

deku_leaf.inventory: [c:s]Deku Leaf[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use this to launch a gust of wind ahead of you that knocks back enemies and objects, at the cost of stamina.
deku_leaf.get: You got the [c:s]Deku Leaf[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Using this will launch a gust of wind ahead of you to knock back enemies and objects.

deku_seed.inventory: [c:s]Deku Seed[/c] [n]Collect as many of these as you can. Someone might be interested in them!

fairy.inventory: [c:s]Fairy[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]This will heal [c:g]8 hearts[/c] if you use it or run out of hearts.
fairy.get: You caught a [c:s]fairy[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will heal [c:g]8 hearts[/c] if you use it or run out of hearts!

feather.inventory: [c:s]Rito Feather[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use this to jump into the air and avoid enemy attacks, at the cost of stamina.
feather.get: You got the [c:s]Rito feather[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Using this will let you jump into the air, potentially avoiding enemy attacks. Try using it with [c:s]Down Thrust[/c]!

fire_rod.inventory: [c:s]Fire Rod[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]This will launch a ball of fire dealing [c:r]1 damage[/c] in the direction you're facing, at the cost of stamina.
fire_rod.get: You got the [c:s]Fire Rod[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will launch a ball of fire dealing [c:r]1 damage[/c] in the direction you're facing.

fish.get: You caught a [c:s]fish[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will heal [c:g]1 heart[/c] if you use it!

fish_big.inventory: [c:s]Big Fish[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use this to [c:g]heal 5 hearts[/c] and some stamina.
fish_big.get: You caught a [c:s]big fish[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will heal [c:g]5 hearts[/c] and some stamina if you use it!

fish_golden.inventory: [c:s]Golden Fish[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use this to [c:g]completely heal you[/c] and refill your stamina.
fish_golden.get: You caught a [c:s]golden fish[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will [c:g]completely refill your hearts and stamina[/c] if you use it!

fishing_rod.inventory: [c:s]Fishing Rod[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use this to find fish you can keep in [c:s]empty bottles[/c].
fishing_rod.get: You got the [c:s]fishing rod[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Use this next to water to find fish to catch! You'll need an empty bottle to put the fish in.

flippers.inventory: [c:s]Zora's Flippers[/c] [n]These allow you to move through deeper water, so that you can explore [c:b]Lake Hylia[/c].
flippers.get: You got the [c:s]Zora's Flippers[/c]![n]These will let you swim through deep water, like in [c:b]Lake Hylia[/c]!

gear.inventory: [c:s]Gear[/c] [n]If you give 3 of these to the Gerudo in the Gerudo Ruins, she'll be able to fix the bridge.

glass_slippers.inventory: [c:s]Glass Slippers[/c] [n]These are very fragile but let you avoid damage or penalties from hazardous floor tiles. They also give +1 damage.

glockenspiel.inventory: [c:b]Glockenspiel[/c] [n]You got this after defeating the Gleeokenspiel, within the Temple of Storms. It resonates with power...
glockenspiel.get: You got the [c:b]glockenspiel[/c]![n]You can feel powerful magic emanating from it when you hold it...[p]This may help you stop [c:b]Octavo[/c]!

goron_locket.inventory: [c:s]Goron Locket[/c][n]Makes the wearer immune to damage from lava and hot coals.
goron_locket.get: You got the [c:s]Goron locket[/c]![n]You don't need to assign it to a button.[p]This will make the wearer immune to damage from lava and hot coals.

great_bow.inventory: [c:s]Great Bow[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Hold the button down and release on the following beat to fire an arrow that can hit and pierce enemies from a distance.
great_bow.get: You got a [c:s]great bow[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]An upgrade on your old bow, this bow fires arrows that pierce enemies, damaging all enemies in a line!

greaves.inventory: [c:s]Greaves[/c] [n]These boots increase your defense, reducing the damage you take on every hit by 0.5.

hero_medal.inventory: [c:s]Hero's Medallion[/c] [n]Gives immunity to poison. A symbol of courage, this medallion was bestowed upon you for surviving the [c:b]Gerudo Arena[/c].
hero_medal.get: You got the [c:s]hero's medallion[/c]![n]A symbol of courage, this passive item grants immunity from poison.

hookshot.inventory: [c:s]Hookshot[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use it to pull yourself to certain objects or stun and knock back enemies.
hookshot.get: You got the [c:s]Hookshot[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]You can use this to latch onto certain objects and pull yourself to them! It can also stun enemies.

hover_boots.inventory: [c:s]Hover Boots[/c] [n]Allows you to float across gaps.

ice_rod.inventory: [c:s]Ice Rod[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]This will launch a ball of ice dealing [c:r]1 damage[/c] in the direction you're facing, at the cost of stamina.
ice_rod.get: You got an [c:s]Ice Rod[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will launch a ball of ice dealing [c:r]1 damage[/c] and freezing enemies in the direction you're facing.

iron_boots.inventory: [c:s]Iron Boots[/c] [n]Move easily through shallow water and prevent knockback, wind effects, and slipping on ice.

kakariko_potion.inventory: [c:s]Hibiscus Potion[/c][n]This can be used to awaken a certain sleeping person...
kakariko_potion.get: You got a [c:s]hibiscus potion[/c]![n]This can be used to awaken a certain sleeping person...

leaping_boots.inventory: [c:s]Boots of Leaping[/c] [n]These boots let you jump 2 full spaces with every move. Press [i:button_left_stick_press] to toggle them on and off.

longshot.inventory: [c:s]Longshot[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use it to pull yourself to certain objects or stun and knock back enemies.
longshot.get: You got the [c:s]Longshot[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]An upgrade on your old Hookshot, this item extends farther and can stun more enemies!

lute.inventory: [c:s]Lute[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use to immediately travel to activated Sheikah Stones around Hyrule.
lute.get: You got the [c:s]lute[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will let you travel instantly to any [c:s]Sheikah Stone[/c] you've activated all around [c:b]Hyrule[/c].

magic_boomerang.inventory: [c:s]Magic Boomerang[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Throw this at enemies to stun or damage them. It always finds its way back to you.
magic_boomerang.get: You got a [c:s]magic boomerang[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]An upgrade on your old boomerang, this boomerang can stun larger enemies and destroy some weaker ones.

magic_cape.inventory: [c:s]Magic Cape[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Using this will allow you to become invisible, consuming stamina and avoiding enemy attacks. Use it again to cancel the effect.
magic_cape.get: You got the [c:s]magic cape[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Using this will allow you to become invisible, avoiding enemy attacks at the cost of stamina.[p]If you use it a second time or run out of stamina, your invisibility will end.

maracas.inventory: [c:b]Maracas[/c] [n]You got these after defeating the Gohmaracas, deep in the [c:b]Lost Swamp[/c]. They resonate with power...
maracas.get: You got the [c:b]maracas[/c]![n]You can feel a magical aura when you hold them...[p]This may help you stop [c:b]Octavo[/c]!

mask_darknut.inventory: [c:s]Darknut Mask[/c] [i:skullkid][n]This mask gives Skull Kid the ability to block damage from the front while standing still. Attacks with a broadsword. Consumes stamina.
mask_darknut.get: You got the [c:s]Darknut Mask[/c]![n]This mask can be worn by [i:skullkid]. It resembles the face of a Darknut.[p]Press [i:button_r] to cycle through [c:b]Skull Kid[/c]'s masks, changing his weapon and abilities.

mask_deku.inventory: [c:s]Deku Mask[/c] [i:skullkid][n]This mask gives Skull Kid the power of a Deku Scrub. Attacks with a head-bonk.

mask_goron.inventory: [c:s]Goron Mask[/c] [i:skullkid][n]This mask gives Skull Kid immunity from lava, hot coals, and bombs. Attacks with a flail.
mask_goron.get: You got the [c:s]Goron Mask[/c]![n]This mask can be worn by [i:skullkid]. It resembles the face of a Goron.[p]Press [i:button_r] to cycle through [c:b]Skull Kid[/c]'s masks, changing his weapon and abilities.

mask_skull.inventory: [c:s]Skull Mask[/c] [i:skullkid][n]A mysterious mask found in Deku Hollow. Can cause attacks to defeat enemies instantly. Attacks with a spear.
mask_skull.get: You got the [c:s]Skull Mask[/c]![n]This mask can be worn by [i:skullkid]. A mysterious aura emanates from it.[p]Press [i:button_r] to cycle through [c:b]Skull Kid[/c]'s masks, changing his weapon and abilities.

mask_truth.inventory: [c:s]Mask of Truth[/c] [i:skullkid][n]A mask that can see the truth, revealing all items, even ones inside chests and other objects. Attacks with a titanium dagger.
mask_truth.get: You got the [c:s]Mask of Truth[/c]![n]This mask can be worn by [i:skullkid]. It has the power to see through certain objects.[p]Press [i:button_r] to cycle through [c:b]Skull Kid[/c]'s masks, changing his weapon and abilities.

mask_zora.inventory: [c:s]Zora Mask[/c] [i:skullkid][n]This mask gives Skull Kid the ability to move freely through water. Attacks with a rapier.
mask_zora.get: You got the [c:s]Zora Mask[/c]![n]This mask can be worn by [i:skullkid]. It resembles the face of a Zora.[p]Press [i:button_r] to cycle through [c:b]Skull Kid[/c]'s masks, changing his weapon and abilities.

megaton_hammer.inventory: [c:s]Megaton Hammer[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Performs a powerful hammer attack directly in front of you, dealing [c:r]3 damage[/c] and smashing some objects, at the cost of stamina.
megaton_hammer.get: You got the [c:s]megaton hammer[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will perform a powerful hammer attack directly in front of you, dealing [c:r]3 damage[/c] and smashing some objects.

misc_heart_piece.inventory: [c:r]Pieces of Heart[/c] [n]Collect four Pieces of Heart to gain a new Heart Container, increasing your maximum health!

oboe.inventory: [c:b]Oboe[/c] [n]You got this after defeating the Wizzroboe, under [c:b]Lake Hylia[/c] in the Frozen Grotto. It resonates with power...
oboe.get: You got the [c:b]oboe[/c]![n]You can feel a magical aura when you hold it...[p]This may help you stop [c:b]Octavo[/c]!

octavos_charm.inventory: [c:s]Octavo's Locket[/c] [n]Gives immunity to wind and electrical damage. A prized heirloom, this locket was passed down through Octavo's family for generations.
octavos_charm.get: You got [c:s]Octavo's Locket[/c]![n]This passive item grants immunity from wind effects and electrical damage.

pegasus_boots.inventory: [c:s]Pegasus Anklet[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Hold then release the assigned button after one or two beats to leap forward, at the cost of stamina.
pegasus_boots.get: You got the [c:s]Pegasus Anklet[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Hold for one or two beats, then release on the following beat to perform a dash attack!

petal_trimmer.inventory: [c:s]Petal Trimmer[/c] [n]It looks like you can use it to style and care for Deku petals.
petal_trimmer.get: You got the [c:s]petal trimmer[/c]![n]It looks like it can be used to style and care for Deku petals.[p]Perhaps someone nearby lost this.

potion_health.inventory: [c:s]Health Potion[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]This will [c:g]completely heal you[/c] if you use it or run out of hearts.
potion_health.get: You got a [c:s]health potion[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will [c:g]completely heal you[/c] if you use it or run out of hearts!

potion_stamina.inventory: [c:s]Stamina Potion[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]This will [c:g]refill your stamina meter[/c] if you use it or run out.
potion_stamina.get: You got a [c:s]stamina potion[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]This will [c:g]refill your stamina meter[/c] if you use it or run out!

power_glove.inventory: [c:s]Power Glove[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use this to pick up rocks and crates, and then use it again to throw them 3 spaces away.
power_glove.get: You got the [c:s]Power Glove[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Pick up an object with this and use it again to throw it to the marked location.

quiver.get: You got the [c:s]big quiver[/c]![n]This lets you carry up to 20 arrows.

ring_blasting.inventory: [c:s]Ring of Blasting[/c] [n]Makes you immune to all explosive damage, and makes your bombs explode immediately.

ring_charisma.inventory: [c:s]Ring of Charisma[/c] [n]Reduces the cost of items for sale in shops around Hyrule.

ring_courage.inventory: [c:s]Ring of Courage[/c] [n]Dash into an enemy's space when you defeat them, preventing damage to yourself.

ring_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Ring of Preservation[/c] [n]Very fragile but prevents all other equipment from losing durability while equipped.

ring_piercing.inventory: [c:s]Ring of Piercing[/c] [n]Weapons can pierce through shields.

ring_protection.inventory: [c:s]Ring of Protection[/c] [n]Reduces all damage done to you by half a heart.

ring_regeneration.inventory: [c:s]Ring of Health[/c] [n]Heals [c:g]half a heart[/c] after you've defeated 5 enemies.

ring_risk.inventory: [c:s]Ring of Risk[/c] [n]Doubles damage dealt when at 1 or fewer hearts remaining.

ring_shielding.inventory: [c:s]Nayru's Ring[/c] [n]Reflects damage done to you from any enemy. One use only.

ring_stealth.inventory: [c:s]Ring of Stealth[/c] [n]Decreases the distance at which enemies can detect the player.

scroll_confuse.inventory: [c:s]Scroll of Confusion[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Confuses nearby enemies when it's used. One use only.

scroll_electricity.inventory: [c:s]Scroll of Electricity[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Temporarily gives your attacks an electric effect. One use only.

scroll_enchant_armor.inventory: [c:s]Scroll of Enchant Armor[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Temporarily increases your armor rating by .5. One use only.

scroll_enchant_weapon.inventory: [c:s]Scroll of Enchant Weapon[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Temporarily increases your damage dealt by 1. One use only.

scroll_freeze_enemies.inventory: [c:s]Scroll of Freezing[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Freezes nearby enemies when it's used. One use only.

scroll_need.inventory: [c:s]Scroll of Need[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Gives you what you need most. One use only.

scroll_pause.inventory: [c:s]Scroll of Haste[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Briefly unlocks your movements from the beat. One use only.

scuba_mask.inventory: [c:s]Snorkel[/c] [n]This lets you dive with the flippers, using [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y], or move through a single deep-water tile without them.
scuba_mask.get: You got the [c:s]snorkel[/c]![n]You don't need to assign this to a button.[p]This lets you move through a single tile of deep water, or dive in deep water if you have the [i:flippers], using [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y].

shield_large.inventory: [c:s]Tower Shield[/c] [i:link][i:cadence][n]Blocks damage when you hold it up, at the cost of stamina. Lets you move through gusts of wind.
shield_large.get: You got a [c:s]tower shield[/c]![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_r], and only [i:link] and [i:cadence] can use it.[p]An upgrade on your old shield, it can block wind and stronger attacks when you hold it up.

shield_mirror.inventory: [c:s]Mirror Shield[/c] [i:link][i:cadence][n]Blocks damage when you hold it up, at the cost of stamina. Can reflect most projectiles.
shield_mirror.get: You got the [c:s]Mirror Shield[/c]![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_r], and only [i:link] and [i:cadence] can use it.[p]An upgrade on your old shield, it can block even stronger attacks and reflect more projectiles when you hold it up.

shield_small.inventory: [c:s]Small Shield[/c] [i:link][i:cadence][n]Blocks damage when you hold it up, at the cost of stamina.
shield_small.get: You got a [c:s]small shield[/c]![n]It's automatically assigned to [i:button_r], and only [i:link] and [i:cadence] can use it.[p]Hold it out to reflect projectiles or block damage using your stamina. It works only in the direction you're facing!

shovel_auto.inventory: [c:s]Auto-shovel[/c] [n]Allows you to dig through walls by moving adjacent to them.

shovel_basic.inventory: [c:s]Shovel[/c] [n]Allows you to dig through walls. It's fragile and not that special.

shovel_battle.inventory: [c:s]Battle Shovel[/c] [n]Allows you to dig through walls, giving +2 damage on your next move.

shovel_courage.inventory: [c:s]Shovel of Courage[/c] [n]Allows you to dig through walls. You dash forward into the space you just dug.

shovel_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Shovel[/c] [n]Very fragile, you lose it when you take damage. Digs through surprisingly tough walls.

shovel_golden.inventory: [c:s]Golden Shovel[/c] [n]Allows you to dig through walls, occasionally spawning rupees.

shovel_stamina.inventory: [c:s]Shovel of Stamina[/c] [n]Allows you to dig through walls, regaining stamina as you dig.

speed_boots.inventory: [c:s]Boots of Speed[/c] [n]These boots let you move faster than the beat!

synth.inventory: [c:b]Synth[/c] [n]You got this after defeating Synthrova, within the [c:b]Temple of Brainstorms[/c]. It resonates with power...
synth.get: You got the [c:b]synth[/c]![n]You can feel magical aura when you hold it...[p]This may help you stop [c:b]Ganon[/c]!

synth_unpowered.get: You got the [c:b]synth[/c]...but it doesn't look like it's working right now. It looks like you need to [c:s]plug it in[/c] somewhere first...

telescope.inventory: [c:s]Telescope[/c] [n]This increases the exploration range in your overworld map, revealing more adjacent screens for you to see.
telescope.get: You got the [c:s]telescope[/c]![n]This allows you to see farther, revealing more screens on the map.[p]Open the map screen by pressing [i:button_plus]. (You may then have to press [i:button_l] to see it!)

tingle_rod.inventory: [c:s]Tingle's Dowser[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Helps you through the [c:b]Lost Woods[/c] or to find treasures.
tingle_rod.get: You got [c:s]Tingle's dowser[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Using this in the [c:b]Lost Woods[/c] will help you find your way through.[n]Using it elsewhere may lead to finding treasures!

torch.inventory: [c:s]Torch[/c] [n]Increases visibility in dark areas. Can burn stumps and light up braziers.

torch_battle.inventory: [c:s]Battle Torch[/c] [n]Returns [c:r]1 damage[/c] to enemies that hit you. Can burn stumps and light up braziers.

torch_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Torch[/c] [n]Provides amazing light and reveals the location of enemies and NPCs. Destroyed when you take damage. Can burn stumps and light up braziers.

torch_magic.inventory: [c:s]Magic Torch[/c] [n]Provides amazing light and reveals the location of enemies, NPCs, and items. Slowly consumes stamina. Can burn stumps and light up braziers.

torch_obsidian.inventory: [c:s]Obsidian Torch[/c] [n]Provides more visibility depending on your beat combo. Can burn stumps and light up braziers.

torch_reflection.inventory: [c:s]Torch of Reflection[/c] [n]Reflects all projectiles, at the cost of some durability. Can burn stumps and light up braziers.

torch_truesight.inventory: [c:s]Torch of Wisdom[/c] [n]Reveals all items, even ones inside chests and other objects. Can burn stumps and light up braziers.

war_drum.inventory: [c:s]War Drum[/c] -- Assign to [i:button_a] [i:button_b] [i:button_x] [i:button_y][n]Use this to skip a beat and power up your attacks on the following beat!
war_drum.get: You got a [c:s]war drum[/c]![n]Assign it to [i:button_a], [i:button_b], [i:button_x], or [i:button_y] on the inventory screen.[p]Use this to skip a beat and power up your attacks on the following beat!

weapon_broadsword.inventory: [c:s]Broadsword[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to 3 adjacent enemies ahead of you.

weapon_broadsword_blood.inventory: [c:s]Ruby Broadsword[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to three adjacent enemies ahead of you, and [c:g]heals half a heart[/c] after defeating 5 enemies.

weapon_broadsword_emerald.inventory: [c:s]Emerald Broadsword[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] and [c:g]poisons[/c] 3 adjacent enemies ahead of you.

weapon_broadsword_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Broadsword[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] to three adjacent enemies ahead of you. Breaks if you get hit.

weapon_broadsword_obsidian.inventory: [c:s]Obsidian Broadsword[/c] [n]Deals up to [c:r]3 damage[/c] depending on your beat combo to three adjacent enemies ahead of you.

weapon_broadsword_titanium.inventory: [c:s]Titanium Broadsword[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] to 3 adjacent enemies ahead of you.

weapon_broadsword_unique.inventory: [c:s]Fragarach[/c][n]A legendary weapon. Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] to 3 adjacent enemies ahead of you and pierces shields.
weapon_broadsword_unique.get: You got [c:s]Fragarach[/c]! [n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] and has [c:b]piercing[/c]. Hits the 3 adjacent spaces in front of you.[p]A sword of legend, [c:s]Fragarach[/c] is said to have an unstoppable edge, capable of cutting through anything in its path.

weapon_dagger.inventory: [c:s]Dagger[/c] [i:zelda][i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you.

weapon_dagger_blood.inventory: [c:s]Ruby Dagger[/c] [i:zelda][i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you, and [c:g]heals half a heart[/c] after defeating 5 enemies.

weapon_dagger_emerald.inventory: [c:s]Emerald Dagger[/c] [i:zelda][i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] and [c:g]poisons[/c] a single enemy in front of you.

weapon_dagger_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Dagger[/c] [i:zelda][i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you. Breaks if you get hit.

weapon_dagger_obsidian.inventory: [c:s]Obsidian Dagger[/c] [i:zelda][i:cadence][n]Deals up to [c:r]3 damage[/c] depending on your beat combo to a single enemy in front of you.

weapon_dagger_titanium.inventory: [c:s]Titanium Dagger[/c] [i:zelda][i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you.

weapon_dagger_unique.inventory: [c:s]Jeweled Dagger[/c] [i:zelda][i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]4 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you.
weapon_dagger_unique.get: You got the [c:s]Jeweled Dagger[/c]! [n]Deals [c:r]4 damage[/c] to the enemy directly in front of you.[p]As dangerous as it is beautiful, this dagger surprises anyone who would stand in your way.

weapon_flail.inventory: [c:s]Flail[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to a single enemy in a wide range, moving you forward.

weapon_flail_blood.inventory: [c:s]Ruby Flail[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to a single enemy in a wide range ahead of you, moving you forward, and [c:g]heals half a heart[/c] after defeating 5 enemies.

weapon_flail_emerald.inventory: [c:s]Emerald Flail[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] and [c:g]poisons[/c] a single enemy in a wide range, moving you forward.

weapon_flail_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Flail[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] to a single enemy in a wide range ahead of you, moving you forward. Breaks if you get hit.

weapon_flail_obsidian.inventory: [c:s]Obsidian Flail[/c] [n]Deals up to [c:r]3 damage[/c] based on your beat combo to a single enemy in a wide range, moving you forward.

weapon_flail_titanium.inventory: [c:s]Titanium Flail[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] to a single enemy in a wide range, moving you forward.

weapon_flail_unique.inventory: [c:s]Hylian Flail[/c] [n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c], with extra knockback, to a single enemy in a wide range, moving you forward.
weapon_flail_unique.get: You got the [c:s]Hylian Flail[/c]! [n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c], with extra [c:b]knockback[/c], in a wide range to either side while moving forward.[p]Brutal and effective, this weapon is used by only the boldest [c:b]Hylian[/c] heroes.

weapon_golden_lute.inventory: [c:s]Golden Lute[/c] [n]The legendary Golden Lute can damage enemies adjacent to you while you move. Deals more damage to beings of pure evil.

weapon_greatshovel.inventory: [c:s]Greatshovel[/c] [i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to three adjacent enemies ahead of you and digs.

weapon_greatshovel_blood.inventory: [c:s]Ruby Greatshovel[/c] [i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to three adjacent enemies ahead of you and digs. [c:g]Heals half a heart[/c] after defeating 5 enemies.

weapon_greatshovel_emerald.inventory: [c:s]Emerald Greatshovel[/c] [i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] and [c:g]poisons[/c] 3 adjacent enemies ahead of you and digs.

weapon_greatshovel_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Greatshovel[/c] [i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] to three adjacent enemies ahead of you and digs. Breaks if you get hit.

weapon_greatshovel_obsidian.inventory: [c:s]Obsidian Greatshovel[/c] [i:cadence][n]Deals up to [c:r]3 damage[/c] (depending on your beat combo) to 3 adjacent enemies ahead of you and digs.

weapon_greatshovel_titanium.inventory: [c:s]Titanium Greatshovel[/c] [i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] to 3 adjacent enemies ahead of you and digs.

weapon_greatshovel_unique.inventory: [c:s]Eli's Greatshovel[/c] [i:cadence][n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] to 3 adjacent enemies ahead of you, plus 1 damage for each dig.
weapon_greatshovel_unique.get: You got [c:s]Eli's Greatshovel[/c]! [n]Used only by [i:cadence]. Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] and digs as you attack, dealing 1 additional damage per tile dug.[p]A legendary warrior named Eli once owned this shovel. Perfect for an enterprising gravedigger.

weapon_longsword.inventory: [c:s]Long Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] with 2 range, but prevents shield use. Hold out with [i:button_r] and swing with [i:button_left_stick].

weapon_longsword_blood.inventory: [c:s]Ruby Long Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] with 2 range, but prevents shield use. Hold out with [i:button_r] and swing with [i:button_left_stick]. [c:g]Heals half a heart[/c] after defeating 5 enemies.

weapon_longsword_emerald.inventory: [c:s]Emerald Long Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] and [c:g]poisons[/c] with 2 range, but prevents shield use. Hold out with [i:button_r] and swing with [i:button_left_stick].

weapon_longsword_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Long Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] with 2 range, but prevents shield use. Hold out with [i:button_r] and swing with [i:button_left_stick]. Breaks if you get hit.

weapon_longsword_obsidian.inventory: [c:s]Obsidian Long Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals up to [c:r]3 damage[/c] based on beat combo with 2 range, but prevents shield use. Hold out with [i:button_r] and swing with [i:button_left_stick].

weapon_longsword_titanium.inventory: [c:s]Titanium Long Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] with 2 range, but prevents shield use. Hold out with [i:button_r] and swing with [i:button_left_stick].

weapon_longsword_unique.inventory: [c:s]Caladbolg[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] with 2 range, but prevents shield use. Hold out with [i:button_r] and swing with [i:button_left_stick].
weapon_longsword_unique.get: You got [c:s]Caladbolg[/c]! [n]Used only by [i:link]. Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] and has 2 range, but prevents shield use. Hold [i:button_r] to swing it around.[p]This weapon is fabled to be the finest long sword of an ancient realm.

weapon_rapier.inventory: [c:s]Rapier[/c] [i:zelda][n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] ([c:r]1[/c] if adjacent to an enemy) and lunges you forward 1.

weapon_rapier_blood.inventory: [c:s]Ruby Rapier[/c] [i:zelda][n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] and lunges you forward 1 or [c:r]1 damage[/c] if adjacent, and [c:g]heals half a heart[/c] after defeating 5 enemies.

weapon_rapier_emerald.inventory: [c:s]Emerald Rapier[/c] [i:zelda][n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] ([c:r]1[/c] if adjacent to an enemy), [c:g]poisons[/c], and lunges you forward 1.

weapon_rapier_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Rapier[/c] [i:zelda][n]Deals [c:r]4 damage[/c] and lunges you forward 1. [c:r]3 damage[/c] if adjacent. Breaks if you get hit.

weapon_rapier_obsidian.inventory: [c:s]Obsidian Rapier[/c] [i:zelda][n]Deals up to [c:r]4 damage[/c] depending on your beat combo (up to [c:r]3[/c] if adjacent to an enemy) and lunges you forward 1.

weapon_rapier_titanium.inventory: [c:s]Titanium Rapier[/c] [i:zelda][n]Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] ([c:r]2[/c] if adjacent to an enemy) and lunges you forward 1.

weapon_rapier_unique.inventory: [c:s]Royal Rapier[/c] [i:zelda][n]Legendary weapon. Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] ([c:r]2[/c] if adjacent to an enemy) and lunges you forward 1, knocking back foes at the cost of stamina.
weapon_rapier_unique.get: You got the [c:s]Royal Rapier[/c]! [n]Used only by [i:zelda]. Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c]. When [c:b]lunging[/c] from 2 spaces away, it deals [c:r]1 extra damage[/c] and knocks back nearby enemies.[p]Passed down by the royal family of [c:b]Hyrule[/c] for generations, it grants heroic strength in times of need to those of noble lineage.

weapon_shortsword.inventory: [c:s]Short Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you.

weapon_shortsword_blood.inventory: [c:s]Ruby Short Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you, and [c:g]heals half a heart[/c] after defeating 5 enemies.

weapon_shortsword_emerald.inventory: [c:s]Emerald Short Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] and [c:g]poisons[/c] a single enemy in front of you.

weapon_shortsword_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Short Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]3 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you. Breaks if you get hit.

weapon_shortsword_obsidian.inventory: [c:s]Obsidian Short Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals up to [c:r]3 damage[/c] depending on your beat combo to a single enemy in front of you.

weapon_shortsword_titanium.inventory: [c:s]Titanium Short Sword[/c] [i:link][n]Deals [c:r]2 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you.

weapon_shortsword_unique.inventory: [c:s]Kokiri Sword[/c] [i:link][n]A legendary weapon. Deals [c:r]4 damage[/c] to a single enemy in front of you.
weapon_shortsword_unique.get: You got the [c:s]Kokiri sword[/c]! [n]Used by [i:link] only. Deals [c:r]4 damage[/c] to the enemy directly in front of you.[p]Said to be intended for a future hero, this weapon was meant to banish anything in [c:b]Link[/c]'s path.

weapon_spear_blood.inventory: [c:s]Ruby Spear[/c] [n]Has 2 range and deals [c:r]1 damage[/c], and [c:g]heals half a heart[/c] after defeating 5 enemies.

weapon_spear_emerald.inventory: [c:s]Emerald Spear[/c] [n]Has 2 range and deals [c:r]1 damage[/c]. Also [c:g]poisons[/c] the target.

weapon_spear_glass.inventory: [c:s]Glass Spear[/c] [n]Has 2 range and deals [c:r]3 damage[/c]. Breaks if you get hit.

weapon_spear_obsidian.inventory: [c:s]Obsidian Spear[/c] [n]Has 2 range and deals up to [c:r]3 damage[/c] based on your beat combo.

weapon_spear_unique.inventory: [c:s]Impa's Naginata[/c] [n]Has 2 range and deals [c:r]1 damage[/c]. Also [c:g]poisons[/c] the target. [c:g]Heals half a heart[/c] after you defeat 5 enemies.
weapon_spear_unique.get: You got [c:s]Impa's naginata[/c]! [n]Deals [c:r]1 damage[/c] and has 2 range, with [c:b]poison[/c] AND [c:b]lifedrain[/c] effects.[p]Crafted for Impa, the great Sheikah warrior, this versatile weapon strikes fear in the hearts of many dark creatures throughout [c:b]Hyrule[/c].
